title: Proportional Problem-Solving Difficulty Analysis Competency Development Program for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic math concepts and foundational knowledge of teaching-learning processes
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive program to develop preservice teachers' systematic analysis skills of elementary students' difficulties in solving proportional reasoning problems

learning_goals: Through team-based learning, learners can compare various problem-solving strategies for proportional reasoning and explain the mathematical knowledge underlying each strategy.
Predict student errors and diagnose at least five specific potential difficulties in problem-solving steps.
Self-assess analytical competencies through individual evaluations and propose revision strategies incorporating feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
